import db from"../firebase";import{ref,get,remove,push,update}from"firebase/database";var dbRef=ref(db,"/stars");var getAllStars=function getAllStars(){return get(dbRef);};var addStar=function addStar(name,discoveryDate,imageUrl,galaxy){return push(dbRef,{galaxy:galaxy,discoveryDate:discoveryDate,imageUrl:imageUrl,name:name});};var removeStar=function removeStar(key){var dbRefStar=ref(db,"/stars/".concat(key));return remove(dbRefStar);};var modifyStar=function modifyStar(key,updatedData){var dbRefStar=ref(db,"/stars/".concat(key));return update(dbRefStar,updatedData);};// eslint-disable-next-line
export default{getAllStars:getAllStars,addStar:addStar,removeStar:removeStar,modifyStar:modifyStar};
